channel.title: Photochromatic (sunlight causes it to darken) Ceramic Glaze
channel.description:
Anyone made a photochromatic ceramic glaze?
Here is a recipe for photochromatic glass:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mUcUy7SqdS0
I wonder if this could be made into a glaze recipe...
